doc:
Alberto Closas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alberto_Closas 0 Alberto Closas Lluró (30 October 1921 in Barcelona – 19 September 1994 in Madrid) was a prolific Spanish film actor who appeared in the Cinema of Argentina in the 1940s and 1950s and in Spanish cinema after 1955. His family emigrated to Argentina in 1936 during the Spanish Civil War where in 1942 he acted in his first film Nada más que amor. He made over 90 film and television appearances and he continued to appear on Spanish television until his death in September 1994 from lung cancer. He was married to Argentine actress Amelia Bence between 1950 and 1955. Alberto_Closas_Lluró ( 30_October_1921 in Barcelona – 19_September_1994 in Madrid ) was a_prolific_Spanish_film_actor who appeared in the_Cinema of Argentina in the_1940s_and_1950s and in Spanish_cinema after 1955 . His_family emigrated to Argentina in 1936 during the_Spanish_Civil_War where in 1942 he acted in his_first_film Nada_más_que_amor . He made over_90_film_and_television_appearances and he continued_to_appear on Spanish_television until his_death in September_1994 from lung_cancer . He was_married to Argentine_actress_Amelia_Bence between 1950_and_1955 .
